root: ^Not knowing what to do next, you run around the circular railing gating your floor of the infinite warehouse. You run past cell after cell before eventually finding what appears to be a set of two silver doors.

button_pushed: ^Hesitantly, you push a white button next to the set of doors. It glows white, illuminating the patch of shadow in the cooridor. You can now tell that you have called the elevator. You step into the elevator as the door opens.
